title: 'Pillow nahi pocha hai'
body: 'Not a pillow but a slightly upgraded version of pocha (wipe).  Thickness of this pocha is good enough for pocha but not for a pillow.  Softness is due to very less quantity of fill rather than due to the material.  Bakwaas product from Solimo i.e. Amazon.'

title: 'POOR QUALITY'
body: Poor quality. Single star is also waste for this product. Don't purchase it.It's just like duster very thin not useful as pillow.money waste .I purchased so many things from Amazon but it is bitter experience and worst product
